text: Vologases I of Armenia was a Parthian prince who ruled Armenia from 117 to 140. He is known to have founded the city of Vagharshapat. After his death, the Romans made Sohaemeus the ruler of Armenia. == References == == Sources == * * Category:2nd-century kings of Armenia Category:Arsacid kings of Armenia Category:2nd-century Iranian people
title: Vologases I of Armenia
